summary: A reclusive physicist creates a mysterious machine in his basement that changes his life and all those around him.
cast: Bill Sage|Adam LeFevre|Jamie Elman|Brittany Benjamin|Daniela Lavender|Jerry Longe|Quinn Kay|Bryan McClure|Gary Planck|Lena Noel Krussel|Matt Harwell|Beth Paprocki|Tina Dixon|Emily Fradenburgh|Michelle Zacharia|Tom Wees|Earl E. Bates III|Virginia Kincaid
title: The Scientist
